description: Zaplox AB engages in the development, marketing, and selling of software for the distribution of a mobile guest trip and mobile keys via mobile phones. The company is headquartered in Lund, Skane. The company went IPO on 2017-06-08. The firm's Innovation Strategy includes protecting all solutions by patents (Licensed and Patent Pending). The firm's technology is to merge knowledge and applications from businesses like Telecommunications, Mechanics, Industrial Design and Service Industry into one solution. The major components of Zaplox ABs control systems consist of a number of servers located centrally. The Zaplox system can be operated and controlled by nearly every mobile phone, ranging from the iPhone and Android, to Java-enabled phones, among others. The Company’s main shareholders are LMK Ventures AB and Mankel Beteiligungen GmbH.
name: Zaplox AB
